         * @protected
         * @reactive
         */

classData.comment:
/**
     * Internal flag which will get set to true while a component is waiting for its mountedPromise
     * @member {Boolean} isAwaitingMount=false
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Internal flag which will get set to true while a component is waiting for its mountedPromise
classData.name: isAwaitingMount

classData.description: Convenience shortcut to access the App this component belongs to
classData.name: app

classData.comment:
/**
     * A Promise that resolves when the component is mounted to the DOM.
     * This provides a convenient way to wait for the component to be fully
     * available and interactive before executing subsequent logic.
     *
     * It also handles unmounting by resetting the promise, so it can be safely
     * awaited again if the component is remounted.
     * @returns {Promise<Neo.component.Base>}
     */
classData.description:
A Promise that resolves when the component is mounted to the DOM. This provides a convenient way to wait for the component to be fully available and interactive before executing subsequent logic.

It also handles unmounting by resetting the promise, so it can be safely awaited again if the component is remounted.
classData.name: mountedPromise

classData.description: Convenience method to access the parent component
classData.name: parent

     * @param {String} [ntype]
     * @returns {Neo.core.Base|null}
     */
